description:
Encryption is increasingly becoming required to protect our privacy in everything we do yet many of us don't know much about how it works. This talk is a journey through the moving parts of Encryption and how it can be applied effectively and sometimes not so much.

This session will explore:

Basic functions in cryptography
Some simple history about cryptography
Modes of operation and why this is important
Some of the well-known cryptography exploits
title: Encryption - it's a thing.
